articles.author: Kevin Liptak and Arlette Saenz, CNN
articles.title: Bidens visit site of devastating Uvalde school shooting - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Sunday faces the grimly familiar task of comforting families after another mass shooting, this time at an elementary school in Texas, as a weary nation grapples with an endless spate of gun violence.
